short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sort open YouTube videos by their length or release date on the current window

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly organize your YouTube viewing experience! Our extension, Sort YouTube Videos, allows you to quickly arrange open YouTube tabs by video length or release date, helping you manage your time and prioritize your watch list. Whether you prefer shortest-to-longest for quick views, longest-to-shortest for in-depth content, or sorting by release date to catch up on the latest uploads, our extension lets you control your YouTube browsing session.

Key Features:
• Sort by video length or release date
• Choose ascending or descending order
• Place sorted YouTube tabs at the beginning or end of your tab list
• Works in your current Chrome window
• Remembers your last sorting preference
• Simple one-click operation

Streamline your YouTube workflow and maximize your viewing time with Sort YouTube Videos!
